ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims - Hobbits
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
1.23.0.0 (10-22-2022)
[h1]Adds Hobbits to RimWorld.[/h1]
Join [url=https://discord.gg/jcMf4am]our Lord of the Rims channel[/url] to discuss the mod. Read [url=https://lord-of-the-rims.wikia.com/wiki/Lord_of_the_Rims_-_Hobbits]our wiki[/url] to learn more. [img]https://i.imgur.com/hfffiCz.png[/img] [list] [*]Playable Hobbit race [*]Starter Hobbit scenario [*]The Shire as a faction [*]Mountable ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198042626816/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]with Giddy-Up![/url]) ponies [*]Pipeweed plants which can be harvested into Pipeweed for Hobbits to smoke [*]Also includes Hobbit apparel, backpacks, weapons, doors, walls, and a plantable party tree [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/6UIPKnS.png[/img] [list] [*]JecsTools, DoorsExpanded, and Humanoid Alien Races [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/k5SlmZa.png[/img] [list] [*]Hobbit dress courtesy of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198089422935/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Gerrymon[/url] [*]Hobbit cape, shirt and vest, and jacket created by Ennacrima [*]A special thank you to all the producers who made this mod happen: [h1]Sole, BaRKy, erdelf, Anton, Oggah, big papa, TheAkbars, ib2grh8, bombadil, Drachir, NanoPaladin, starbucksandchill, Epicurus, Sacriel42.[/h1]
[h1]Special thanks to Mlie's additions and improvements in Jecrell's absence[/h1]: - Added support for Combat Extended - Fixed starting goodwill with Empire - Fixed the Party-tree, via SoongJr
Thank you to my Patrons for supporting me in my efforts. Without you, none of this would be possible.
These are the most excellent rim dwellers who support me: Darcilyn Lynds (darci.andel), Luke Salinas, RainerWingel , Noisy Koi, Lea Stannard, David Silberstein, Matt Harris, Kiya Nicoll, Paul Fenwick, Genaeve , Populous25 , David Turner, TinyATuin, Michael Cailler, Jimes Tooper, Sharp Spook, Don Homer, roxxploxx , Alex Mederer, Dan Jones, Michael Whitehead, iknowdude00, Kaz, Alexander , Ken Birdwell, Darcilyn Lynds (darci.andel), Luke Salinas, RainerWingel , Noisy Koi, Lea Stannard, David Silberstein, Matt Harris, Kiya Nicoll, Paul Fenwick, Genaeve , Populous25 , David Turner, TinyATuin, Michael Cailler, Jimes Tooper, Sharp Spook, Don Homer, roxxploxx , Alex Mederer, Dan Jones, Michael Whitehead, iknowdude00, Kaz, Alexander , Ken Birdwell
======================== Changelog ======================== 1.23.0.0 (10-22-2022) ======================== Updates Hobbits for RimWorld 1.4; Adds Hobbit culture and text generation for Ideology
1.22.0.0 (08-15-2021) ======================== Updated for RimWorld 1.3. Starting scenario adjusted to start with replantable party tree, some pipeweed, and starting tech to build hobbit holes from the beginning.
# Changelog for LordoftheRimsHobbits
1.0.7.0 - Updated for 1.3, hair-styles needs fixing still
1.0.6.0 - Fixed some errors connected to the update of Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
1.0.5.0 - Fixed the Party-tree, via SoongJr
1.0.4.0 - Fixed an outdated reference in the race-definition
1.0.3.0 - Fixed starting goodwill with Empire
1.0.2.0 - Fixed some thoughtdefs
1.0.1.0 - Added support for Combat Extended
1.0.0.0 - First publish
